columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address.
columns.line_1: The primary address line, usually including the street number and name.
columns.line_2: The secondary address line, often for apartments or suites.
columns.line_3: The additional address line for further details, currently unused.
columns.city: The city where the address is located.
columns.zip_postcode: The postal code for the address.
columns.state_province_county: The state, province, or county of the address.
columns.country: The country where the address is situated.
columns.other_address_details: The field for any additional address information, currently unused.

Addresses.table_description: The table stores detailed information about addresses.

columns.degree_program_id: The unique identifier for each degree program.
columns.department_id: The identifier for the department offering the program.
columns.degree_summary_name: The name of the degree program.
columns.degree_summary_description: The short description of the degree program.
columns.other_details: The field for additional details about the program, currently unused.

Degree_Programs.table_description: The table catalogs degree programs offered by various departments.

columns.section_id: The unique identifier for each section.
columns.course_id: The identifier for the course associated with the section.
columns.section_description: The brief description of the section.
columns.other_details: The field for additional section information, currently unused.

Sections.table_description: The table tracks sections of courses in the curriculum.

columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course.
columns.course_name: The name of the course offered to students.
columns.course_description: The brief description of the course content.
columns.other_details: The field for any additional course details, currently unused.

Courses.table_description: The table catalogs courses available for student enrollment.

columns.department_id: The unique identifier for each department.
columns.department_name: The name of the department within the institution.
columns.department_description: The brief description of the department's focus and offerings.
columns.other_details: The field for additional details about the department, currently unused.

Departments.table_description: The table lists departments associated with various degree programs.

columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student.
columns.current_address_id: The identifier for the student's current address.
columns.permanent_address_id: The identifier for the student's permanent address.
columns.first_name: The first name of the student.
columns.middle_name: The middle name of the student.
columns.last_name: The last name of the student.
columns.cell_mobile_number: The mobile phone number of the student.
columns.email_address: The email address of the student.
columns.date_first_registered: The date when the student first registered.
columns.date_left: The date when the student left the institution.
columns.other_student_details: The field for additional student-related information.

Students.table_description: The table manages detailed information about students.

columns.semester_id: The unique identifier for each semester.
columns.semester_name: The name designating the specific semester.
columns.semester_description: The brief description of the semester.
columns.other_details: The field for any additional semester-related information.

Semesters.table_description: The table organizes and details semester information for student enrolments.

columns.student_enrolment_id: The unique identifier for each student enrolment record.
columns.degree_program_id: The identifier for the degree program the student is enrolled in.
columns.semester_id: The identifier for the semester during which the enrolment occurs.
columns.student_id: The unique identifier for each student enrolled.
columns.other_details: The field for additional enrolment information, currently unused.

Student_Enrolment.table_description: The table manages records of student enrolments in degree programs.

columns.student_course_id: The unique identifier for each enrolment in a course.
columns.course_id: The identifier for the specific course assigned to the enrolment.
columns.student_enrolment_id: The identifier linking to the student's enrolment record.

Student_Enrolment_Courses.table_description: The table links students' enrolments to the courses they are taking.

columns.transcript_id: The unique identifier for each transcript.
columns.transcript_date: The date and time when the transcript was generated.
columns.other_details: The field for additional information regarding the transcript, currently unused.

Transcripts.table_description: The table stores records of transcripts generated for students.

columns.student_course_id: The identifier for the course in the student's transcript.
columns.transcript_id: The unique identifier for each generated transcript.

Transcript_Contents.table_description: The table links courses to their corresponding student transcripts.
